title: Coinbase Issues $130 Billion ‘Systemic’ Bitcoin Price Warning
description: The global head of research at Coinbase has warned the trend of companies buying bitcoin could pose a “systemic risk” to the crypto market...
content:
Bitcoin has fallen sharply after Israel launched a devastating attack on Iran overnight, with traders braced for an extraordinary White House update.
Front-run Donald Trump, the White House and Wall… [+3504 chars]
